Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 22 Nov 2018 If you are a foreigner and able to satisfy one of the following, usually those with young kids are at advantageSpouse and unmarried children (below 21 years old) of a Singapore Citizen (SC)/Permanent Resident (SPR);Aged parents of a Singapore Citizen;P, Q or S work pass holders working in Singapore;Investors/Entrepreneurs;0 comments0
